title: wetpaint font identification
content:
Hello everyone,

I would really like some help identifying this font used for the wetpaint identity.  
Your assistance would be greatly appreciated.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131013065546im_/http:/typophile.com/files/wet_5765.gif)

Kindest regards,  
David
author: dache

comments.content: This could be modified Avenir or Gotham.
The a of Gotham does look very similar but I am not sure its this.
